subject: ALS01252206023 修改申报金额
description_text:
您好， 因为系统升级，仓库这边一般无法修改，需要您取消旧单，然后重新下单，若您这边要求仓库帮您修改，仓库可尝试按您的要求操作，平台那边是无法同步的 如果后续出现破损、丢件等问题，出现保险无法理赔、赔付金额无法满足诉求等风险，需您自行承担，是否确定要仓库修改且产生风险可自行承担呢？ 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
八达通深圳仓 温馨提示：
1 ）后续您在平台选择我们八达通渠道发欧盟国家，沙特阿拉伯，印度尼西亚，韩国，越南，挪威，若平台无法填写相关信息，下单后可自行在这个链接填写收件人的税号等信息，若后续税号等信息有变动，在仓库制单出国际单号之前是可以修改的，出国际单号之后就无法修改了，烦请知悉；
http://ali.8dt.com/ <http://ali.8dt.com/ >
2）关于商业快递包裹申报价值低报的风险说明https://service.alibaba.com/page/knowledge?pageId=127&category=9933584&knowledge=20139944&language=zh <https://service.alibaba.com/page/knowledge?pageId=127&category=9933584&knowledge=20139944&language=zh >；
3）https://activity.alibaba.com/onetouch/b8969697.html?spm=a272c.11036298.jb1z08k2.6.4f6f2040OwL9cs <https://activity.alibaba.com/onetouch/b8969697.html?spm=a272c.11036298.jb1z08k2.6.4f6f2040OwL9cs > 【重要提示】请客户关注：仓库针对无主件/异常件/退件的处理规则
4）非无忧专线的大陆渠道（非香港渠道）/香港DHL 渠道不接受带电产品。
5）阿里巴巴国际站物流服务安全保障规则https://rule.alibaba.com/rule/detail/10000007.htm <https://rule.alibaba.com/rule/detail/10000007.htm >
6） UPS无进袋免抛的计费项，若货物尺寸小于20*30，无法贴UPS面单需要进UPS袋子，货物尺寸按照UPS进袋后的体积计费 https://service.alibaba.com/page/knowledge?pageId=127&category=1000051761&knowledge=1060649967&language=zh <https://service.alibaba.com/page/knowledge?pageId=127&category=1000051761&knowledge=1060649967&language=zh >
7）阿里巴巴国际站平台快递带电带磁类线路介绍https://service.alibaba.com/page/knowledge?pageId=127&category=1000084578&knowledge=1060770725&language=zh <https://service.alibaba.com/page/knowledge?pageId=127&category=1000084578&knowledge=1060770725&language=zh >
8）仓库针对无主件/异常件/退件的处理规则Find quality Manufacturers, Suppliers, Exporters, Importers, Buyers, Wholesalers, Products and Tradehttps://activity.alibaba.com/onetouch/b8....4f6f2040OwL9cs <https://activity.alibaba.com/onetouch/b8....4f6f2040OwL9cs >帮助中心https://service.alibaba.com/page/knowledge?pageId=127&category=9933584&knowledge=20139944&language=zhhttps://service.alibaba.com/page/knowl...944&language=zhAlibaba.com <https://service.alibaba.com/page/knowledge?pageId=127&category=9933584&knowledge=20139944&language=zhhttps://service.alibaba.com/page/knowl...944&language=zhAlibaba.com > 规则中心https://rule.alibaba.com/rule/detail/10000007.htmhttps://rule.alibaba.com/rule/detail/10000007.htm <https://rule.alibaba.com/rule/detail/10000007.htmhttps://rule.alibaba.com/rule/detail/10000007.htm >
Customer Service Representative
Shenzhen Profit Fields Logistics Co., Ltd.
Tel: 0755-86241678；0755-29307176 
E-mail：alicust19@8dt.com
Address:广东省深圳市光明区马田街道金安路75号 永利八达通光明物流园

conversations.body_text:
您好，已修改，请核实是否有误，谢谢！
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
